snippet: In Michael Gordon’s “Timber,” the group Mantra Percussion uses mallets and fingertips to beat out rhythmic patterns on six wooden beams.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews concert of Michael Gordon's new music piece Timber, performed by Mantra Percussion, at Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: In Michael Gordon’s “Timber,” the group Mantra Percussion uses mallets and fingertips to beat out rhythmic patterns on six wooden beams.

headline.print_headline: The Wonders of Wood, Soaring From the Rhythms of Six Planks
headline.main: The Wonders of Wood, Soaring From the Rhythms of Six Planks
